meanings.definition: The act of using an airbrush to apply paint or makeup.
meanings.sent1: She learned airbrushing in art class and painted a beautiful mural on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The makeup artist used airbrushing to create a flawless look for the photoshoot.
meanings.sent3: The clown's airbrushing skills were so good that he painted his own face in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her airbrushing technique was like a magic wand, transforming the plain canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibit featured a stunning display of airbrushing, showcasing different painting styles.

meanings.definition: The process of digitally altering a photograph to remove imperfections.
meanings.sent1: The magazine cover was a result of skillful airbrushing to make the model look flawless.
meanings.sent2: Many celebrities' photos undergo airbrushing before being published in magazines.
meanings.sent3: The airbrushing on the photo made the cat look like it was wearing sunglasses!
meanings.sent4: The airbrushing of memories in her mind made everything seem perfect in hindsight.
meanings.sent5: The before-and-after photos clearly showed the power of airbrushing in the photography industry.
